title: Thunderbird mobile
creator: gerrit.leder
content:
Hello all,

Thank you for thunderbird mobile!

I cannot enter separators or tab in thunderbird mobile for multiple email addresses in to field: error when reading the address (German)

Please allow multiple email addresses!

Best regards Gerrit
